name: Merciless Intent
description:
Welcome to the stadium.

Where have you wandered in?

Once you walk through those doors there is no turning back.

After years of not having a new fighter, the arena has finally earned a new name. You fight through different arenas while figuring out where you are. Was coming here an accident? Or was it meant to be? Finish through all the arenas, and you will become an honored champion! But if you lose, consequences will plague you.

This game includes 10+ arenas to go through with a custom level builder unlocked after you've finished the game!

  • Use the WASD keys to move and Spacebar to shoot. You can also hold 2 keys together to move diagonally. Like, W + A/D to move diagonally up, and A + S/D to move diagonally down.
  • This is a rage infused game, so play if you have the skills.
  • This game is only available in English.

NOTE: This game has some flashing colors/text, so play with caution.

If you like the music then listen to it here: https://spinrilla.com/mixtapes/u-g-merciless-intent
